title: Meghan and Harry are thinking of moving to Canada
text:
Meghan and Harry are thinking of moving to Canada

Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, are reportedly considering moving to Canada.

The couple are thinking of leaving the conventional royal life and relocating, a source told US Weekly.

“Meghan and Harry have considered moving to Canada as it’s part of the Commonwealth,” the source said.

The insider noted that moving to the North American country would be familiar ground for Meghan as she lived in Toronto for several years while filming the TV series Suits.

This isn’t the first time the couple have been rumoured to be leaving their home at Frogmore Cottage in Windsor, England, according to FOX news.

Prior to the birth of their son, Archie, in May, Meghan (38) and Harry (35) were drawing up plans for an international job that would have them relocate to Africa, news.com.au reports.

The royal insider added that relocating is an option that Meghan and Harry are seriously considering but for now the pair are enjoying raising their five-month-old son in the English countryside.

Sources: US Weekly, FOX news, news.com.au
description: Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, are reportedly considering moving to Canada.
